typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	isReported as integer (0)
}
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		COUNTYNAME as string,
		STATENAME as string,
		REGION as string,
		FIPS as string,
		YEAR as string,
		TOTAL_COUNTYAGENCIES as string,
		TOTAL_REPORTINGAGENCIES as string,
		TOTAL_RACEAGENCIES as string,
		TOTAL_ETHNICITYAGENCIES as string,
		TOTAL_CLRREPORTINGAGENCIES as string,
		{REPORTINGAGENCIES.PROP} as string,
		{RACEAGENCIES.PROP} as string,
		{ETHNICITYAGENCIES.PROP} as string,
		{CLRREPORTINGAGENCIES.PROP} as string,
		AVERAGE_MONTHSREPORTED as string,
		AVERAGE_CLRMONTHSREPORTED as string,
		POP as string,
		Total_Arrests as string,
		Part1_Arrests as string,
		Part2_Arrests as string,
		Violent_Arrests as string,
		Property_Arrests as string,
		Homicide_Arrests as string,
		Rape_Arrests as string,
		Robbery_Arrests as string,
		AggAssault_Arrests as string,
		Burglary_Arrests as string,
		Larceny_Arrests as string,
		MotorVehicleTheft_Arrests as string,
		SimpleAssault_Arrests as string,
		Arson_Arrests as string,
		ForgeryCounterfeit_Arrests as string,
		Fraud_Arrests as string,
		Embezzlement_Arrests as string,
		StolenProp_Arrests as string,
		Vandalism_Arrests as string,
		Weapons_Arrests as string,
		Prostitution_Arrests as string,
		SexOffense_Arrests as string,
		DrugAbuse_Arrests as string,
		Gambling_Arrests as string,
		FamilyChildren_Arrests as string,
		DUI_Arrests as string,
		Liquor_Arrests as string,
		Drunkeness_Arrests as string,
		Disorderly_Arrests as string,
		Vagrancy_Arrests as string,
		Other_Arrests as string,
		Suspicion_Arrests as string,
		CurfewLoitering_Arrests as string,
		Runaways_Arrests as string,
		POP_TOTAL as string,
		POP_UNDER18 as string,
		POP_OVER18 as string,
		POP_MALE as string,
		POP_FEMALE as string,
		POP_AGE_0_9 as string,
		POP_M0_9 as string,
		POP_F0_9 as string,
		POP_AGE_10_12 as string,
		POP_M10_12 as string,
		POP_F10_12 as string,
		POP_AGE_13_15 as string,
		POP_M13_15 as string,
		POP_F13_15 as string,
		POP_AGE_16_17 as string,
		POP_M16_17 as string,
		POP_F16_17 as string,
		POP_AGE_18_24 as string,
		POP_M18_24 as string,
		POP_F18_24 as string,
		POP_AGE_25_29 as string,
		POP_M25_29 as string,
		POP_F25_29 as string,
		POP_AGE_30_34 as string,
		POP_M30_34 as string,
		POP_F30_34 as string,
		POP_AGE_35_39 as string,
		POP_M35_39 as string,
		POP_F35_39 as string,
		POP_AGE_40_44 as string,
		POP_M40_44 as string,
		POP_F40_44 as string,
		POP_AGE_45_49 as string,
		POP_M45_49 as string,
		POP_F45_49 as string,
		POP_AGE_50_54 as string,
		POP_M50_54 as string,
		POP_F50_54 as string,
		POP_AGE_55_59 as string,
		POP_M55_59 as string,
		POP_F55_59 as string,
		POP_AGE_60_64 as string,
		POP_M60_64 as string,
		POP_F60_64 as string,
		POP_AGE_65_85 as string,
		POP_M65_85 as string,
		POP_F65_85 as string,
		POP_WHITE as string,
		POP_JW as string,
		POP_AW as string,
		POP_BLACK as string,
		POP_JB as string,
		POP_AB as string,
		POP_ASIAN as string,
		POP_JA as string,
		POP_AA as string,
		POP_NATIVE as string,
		POP_JI as string,
		POP_AI as string,
		POP_HISPANIC as string,
		POP_JH as string,
		POP_AH as string,
		POP_NON_HISPANIC as string,
		POP_JN as string,
		POP_AN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> AllArrestsDataSource
source(output(
		AreaId as integer,
		AreaTypeId as integer,
		RegionId as integer,
		StateId as integer,
		Fips as integer,
		AreaName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Area
AllArrestsDataSource filter(YEAR != 'NA' || YEAR != 'na' || COUNTYNAME != 'NA' || COUNTYNAME != 'na' || STATENAME != 'NA' || STATENAME != 'na' || COUNTYNAME != '_Undetermined' || FIPS != 'NA' || FIPS != 'na') ~> RemoveNA
RemoveNA derive(COUNTYNAME = upper(COUNTYNAME),
		TOTAL_ARRESTS = case(lower(Total_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Total_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Total_Arrests))),
		PARTI_ARRESTS = case(lower(Part1_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Part1_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Part1_Arrests))),
		PARTII_ARRESTS = case(lower(Part2_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Part2_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Part2_Arrests))),
		VIOLENT_ARRESTS = case(lower(Violent_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Violent_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Violent_Arrests))),
		PROPERTY_ARRESTS = case(lower(Property_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Property_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Property_Arrests))),
		HOMICIDE_ARRESTS = case(lower(Homicide_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Homicide_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Homicide_Arrests))),
		RAPE_ARRESTS = case(lower(Rape_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Rape_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Rape_Arrests))),
		ROBBERY_ARRESTS = case(lower(Robbery_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Robbery_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Robbery_Arrests))),
		AGGASSULT_ARRESTS = case(lower(AggAssault_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AggAssault_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AggAssault_Arrests))),
		BURGALARY_ARRESTS = case(lower(Burglary_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Burglary_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Burglary_Arrests))),
		LARCENY_ARRESTS = case(lower(Larceny_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Larceny_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Larceny_Arrests))),
		MOTORVEHICLE_ARRESTS = case(lower(MotorVehicleTheft_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(MotorVehicleTheft_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(MotorVehicleTheft_Arrests))),
		ASSAULT_ARRESTS = case(lower(SimpleAssault_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(SimpleAssault_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(SimpleAssault_Arrests))),
		ARSON_ARRESTS = case(lower(Arson_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Arson_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Arson_Arrests))),
		FORGERY_ARRESTS = case(lower(ForgeryCounterfeit_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(ForgeryCounterfeit_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(ForgeryCounterfeit_Arrests))),
		FRAUD_ARRESTS = case(lower(Fraud_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Fraud_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Fraud_Arrests))),
		EMBEZZLEMENT_ARRESTS = case(lower(Embezzlement_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Embezzlement_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Embezzlement_Arrests))),
		STOLENPROP_ARRESTS = case(lower(StolenProp_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(StolenProp_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(StolenProp_Arrests))),
		VANDALISM_ARRESTS = case(lower(Vandalism_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Vandalism_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Vandalism_Arrests))),
		WEAPONS_ARRESTS = case(lower(Weapons_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Weapons_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Weapons_Arrests))),
		PROSTITUTION_ARRESTS = case(lower(Prostitution_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Prostitution_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Prostitution_Arrests))),
		SEXOFFENSES_ARRESTS = case(lower(SexOffense_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(SexOffense_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(SexOffense_Arrests))),
		DRUGABUSE_ARRESTS = case(lower(DrugAbuse_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(DrugAbuse_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(DrugAbuse_Arrests))),
		GAMBLING_ARRESTS = case(lower(Gambling_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Gambling_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Gambling_Arrests))),
		FAMILYCHILDREN_ARRESTS = case(lower(FamilyChildren_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(FamilyChildren_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(FamilyChildren_Arrests))),
		DUI_Arrests = case(lower(DUI_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(DUI_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(DUI_Arrests))),
		LIQUOR_ARRESTS = case(lower(Liquor_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Liquor_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Liquor_Arrests))),
		DRUNKENESS = case(lower(Drunkeness_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Drunkeness_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Drunkeness_Arrests))),
		DISORDERLY_ARRESTS = case(lower(Disorderly_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Disorderly_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Disorderly_Arrests))),
		VAGRANCY_ARRESTS = case(lower(Vagrancy_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Vagrancy_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Vagrancy_Arrests))),
		OTHER_ARRESTS = case(lower(Other_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Other_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Other_Arrests))),
		SUSPICION_ARRESTS = case(lower(Suspicion_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Suspicion_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Suspicion_Arrests))),
		CURFEWLOITERING_ARRESTS = case(lower(CurfewLoitering_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(CurfewLoitering_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(CurfewLoitering_Arrests))),
		RUNAWAYS_ARRESTS = case(lower(Runaways_Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Runaways_Arrests) < 0 , 0, toInteger(Runaways_Arrests))),
		FORMATTED_YEAR = toInteger(YEAR),
		TOTAL_POPULATION = case(lower(POP) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(POP) < 0 , 0, toInteger(POP))),
		AVERAGEMONTH_REPORTED = 0,
		ISREPORTED = $isReported,
		STATENAME = upper(STATENAME),
		ORI7 = 0) ~> ConvertDataType
ConvertDataType, CountyOnly join(toInteger(AllArrestsDataSource@FIPS) == Area@Fips,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinWithAREA
Area filter(AreaTypeId == 4) ~> CountyOnly
JoinWithAREA sink(input(
		Year as integer,
		AreaId as integer,
		AreaTypeId as integer,
		IsReported as boolean,
		Fips as integer,
		ORI7 as string,
		TotalPopulation as integer,
		AverageMonthOfDataReported as double,
		AllOffenses as integer,
		PartI as integer,
		PartII as integer,
		Violent as integer,
		AggravatedAssault as integer,
		Homicide as integer,
		Rape as integer,
		Robbery as integer,
		Property as integer,
		Arson as integer,
		Burglary as integer,
		Larceny as integer,
		MotorVehicleTheft as integer,
		CurfewLoitering as integer,
		DisorderlyConduct as integer,
		DrivingUnderTheInfluence as integer,
		DrugAbuse as integer,
		Drunkenness as integer,
		Embezzlement as integer,
		ForgeryCounterfeiting as integer,
		Fraud as integer,
		Gambling as integer,
		LiquorLaws as integer,
		OffensesAgainstFamilyChildren as integer,
		OtherNonTrafficOffenses as integer,
		Prostitution as integer,
		Runaway as integer,
		SexOffense as integer,
		SimpleAssault as integer,
		StolenProperty as integer,
		Suspicion as integer,
		Vagrancy as integer,
		Vandalism as integer,
		Weapons as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Year = FORMATTED_YEAR,
		AreaId,
		AreaTypeId,
		IsReported = ISREPORTED,
		Fips = Area@Fips,
		ORI7,
		TotalPopulation = TOTAL_POPULATION,
		AverageMonthOfDataReported = AVERAGEMONTH_REPORTED,
		AllOffenses = ConvertDataType@TOTAL_ARRESTS,
		PartI = Part1_Arrests,
		PartII = PARTII_ARRESTS,
		Violent = ConvertDataType@VIOLENT_ARRESTS,
		AggravatedAssault = AGGASSULT_ARRESTS,
		Homicide = ConvertDataType@HOMICIDE_ARRESTS,
		Rape = ConvertDataType@RAPE_ARRESTS,
		Robbery = ConvertDataType@ROBBERY_ARRESTS,
		Property = ConvertDataType@PROPERTY_ARRESTS,
		Arson = ConvertDataType@ARSON_ARRESTS,
		Burglary = Burglary_Arrests,
		Larceny = ConvertDataType@LARCENY_ARRESTS,
		MotorVehicleTheft = MOTORVEHICLE_ARRESTS,
		CurfewLoitering = ConvertDataType@CURFEWLOITERING_ARRESTS,
		DisorderlyConduct = ConvertDataType@DISORDERLY_ARRESTS,
		DrugAbuse = ConvertDataType@DRUGABUSE_ARRESTS,
		Drunkenness = DRUNKENESS,
		Embezzlement = ConvertDataType@EMBEZZLEMENT_ARRESTS,
		ForgeryCounterfeiting = FORGERY_ARRESTS,
		Fraud = ConvertDataType@FRAUD_ARRESTS,
		Gambling = ConvertDataType@GAMBLING_ARRESTS,
		LiquorLaws = ConvertDataType@LIQUOR_ARRESTS,
		OffensesAgainstFamilyChildren = ConvertDataType@FAMILYCHILDREN_ARRESTS,
		OtherNonTrafficOffenses = ConvertDataType@OTHER_ARRESTS,
		Prostitution = ConvertDataType@PROSTITUTION_ARRESTS,
		Runaway = ConvertDataType@RUNAWAYS_ARRESTS,
		SexOffense = SEXOFFENSES_ARRESTS,
		SimpleAssault = SimpleAssault_Arrests,
		StolenProperty = ConvertDataType@STOLENPROP_ARRESTS,
		Suspicion = ConvertDataType@SUSPICION_ARRESTS,
		Vagrancy = ConvertDataType@VAGRANCY_ARRESTS,
		Vandalism = ConvertDataType@VANDALISM_ARRESTS,
		Weapons = ConvertDataType@WEAPONS_ARRESTS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> AllOffensesDestination
